column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is offered freedom in exchange for [Root.GetHerHis] consent to marriage.
[Root.GetHerHisCap] marriage has not been sanctioned by your religious head\n
[From.GetTitledFirstName], your host, has decided to offer you freedom if you accept to marry [From.GetHerHim]. \nFailure to do so might may result in death or worse.\nWhat do you answer?
I'd rather die than marry that swine!
Do I really have a choice?
will be informed of your decision.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] wisely decided to accept your just offer and will marry you.
Let the preparations for the ceremony begin!
Now that I think of it, it wouldn't be wise.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] harshly responded that [From.GetSheHe] would die rather than marry you.
I won't let [From.GetHerHim] go so easily.
The hard way was indeed succesful, my lord, [From.GetTitledFirstName] accepted your kind offer.
Even tortures couldn't bend [From.GetFirstName]'s will, what shall we do?
[From.GetBestName] refused again even though [From.GetSheHe] is now little more then a bloody, mutilated mess. Further torture might only result in their death or complete incapacitation.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] will be convinced to marry you.
Free the child and let [Root.GetHerHim] live at your court.
Took my close kin as hostage
Free [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and take [Root.GetHerHis] child as hostage.
Choose the place of detention for this prisoner.
Where would you want [From.GetTitledFirstName] to be inmate?
Your host decided to move you to the dungeons.
Your host decided to put you under house arrest.
Your host decided to put you in the oubliette.
What have I done to deserve this?
